approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator used in permit signatures.

addLockups.description: Adds addresses to the lockups list.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner's account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens for a given address.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoint data for an address at a specific position.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used in token amounts.

delegate.description: Delegates votes to a specific address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates votes to a specific address using a signature.

delegates.description: Returns the delegate address for a given account.

getPastTotalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

getPastVotes.description: Returns the number of votes for an account at a specific block number.

getVotes.description: Returns the current number of votes for an account.

lockups.description: Returns the list of lockup addresses.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce used for permit signatures for an address.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for an account.

owner.description: Returns the address of the current owner of the contract.

permit.description: Allows a spender to withdraw tokens from an owner's account using a permit signature.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.
